Package gov.nih.nlm.ling.util

Class SemUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.util.SemUtils

  • public class SemUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static utility methods for dealing with semantic information (semantic types, groups, etc.). Semantic type/group information is expected to be present in key/value pairs in a domain properties file.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SemUtils​()

      • SemUtils

        public SemUtils​()

    • Method Detail

      • getGeneralizations

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Class> getGeneralizations​(java.lang.Class clazz)
        Finds all extended superclasses and implemented interfaces for a given class. This is useful in querying the semanticItems of a Document by class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class for querying
        Returns:
        a set of classes/interfaces extended or implemented by clazz.

      • isGeneralizationOf

        public static boolean isGeneralizationOf​(java.lang.Class clazz,
                                         java.lang.Class superClazz)
        Determines whether in a pair of classes, one extends/implements the other.
        Parameters:
        clazz - a class
        superClazz - potential superclass/interface
        Returns:
        true if clazz extends/implements superClazz

      • hasGeneralizationOf

        public static boolean hasGeneralizationOf​(java.lang.Class clazz,
                                          java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class> superClazzes)
        Determines whether a class extends/implements another in a list of classes/interfaces.
        Parameters:
        clazz - a class
        superClazzes - list of potential superclasses/interfaces
        Returns:
        true if clazz extends/implements one in superClazzes

      • semTypeEquality

        public static boolean semTypeEquality​(SurfaceElement a,
                                      SurfaceElement b,
                                      boolean headOnly)
        Finds whether two textual units have any semantic types in common.
        Parameters:
        a - the first textual unit
        b - the second textual unit
        headOnly - whether to consider head semantics only
        Returns:
        whether any semantic types in common exist

      • matchingSemGroup

        public static java.lang.String matchingSemGroup​(SurfaceElement a,
                                                SurfaceElement b,
                                                boolean headOnly)
        Finds, if any, the semantic group two textual units have in common.

        It returns the first semantic group in iteration, if more than one such semantic group exists. Returns null if no semantic group is common.

        Parameters:
        a - the first textual unit
        b - the second textual unit
        headOnly - whether to consider head semantics only
        Returns:
        whether any semantic groups in common exist

      • semGroupEquality

        public static boolean semGroupEquality​(SurfaceElement candidate,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> semTypes)
        Finds whether a textual unit has any semantic type that is in the semantic type list provided.
        Parameters:
        candidate - the textual unit to consider
        semTypes - a list of semantic types
        Returns:
        whether the textual unit has any semantic type that is in semTypes

      • conjSemTypeEquality

        public static boolean conjSemTypeEquality​(java.util.List<SemanticItem> sems,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> semTypes)
        Finds whether any semantic object in a list has a semantic type that is in the semantic type list provided.
        Parameters:
        sems - the list of semantic objects
        semTypes - the list of semantic types
        Returns:
        true if any semantic object has a semantic type in semTypes

      • conjSemGroupEquality

        public static boolean conjSemGroupEquality​(java.util.List<SemanticItem> sems,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> semGroups)
        Similar to conjSemTypeEquality(List, List), except this method considers semantic groups of the semantic objects, rather than types.
        Parameters:
        sems - the list of semantic objects
        semGroups - the list of semantic groups
        Returns:
        true if any semantic object has a semantic group in semGroups

      • matchingSemGroup

        public static java.lang.String matchingSemGroup​(SemanticItem a,
                                                SemanticItem b)
        Finds the semantic group that is common to two semantic objects.
        Parameters:
        a - the first semantic object
        b - the second semantic object
        Returns:
        the semantic group common to both semantic objects, null if there is no common semantic group

      • matchingSemType

        public static java.lang.String matchingSemType​(SemanticItem a,
                                               SemanticItem b,
                                               boolean updateType)
        Finds the semantic types common to two semantic objects.

        It takes the first semantic type in iteration, if multiple semantic types are in common. It may update their active semantic type of the semantic objects, if specified.

        Parameters:
        a - the first semantic object
        b - the second semantic object
        updateType - whether to update the active semantic types to the common semantic type
        Returns:
        the semantic type in common, or null if no common semantic type

      • getSemGroups

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> getSemGroups​(SemanticItem a)
        Finds all the semantic groups of a semantic object.
        Parameters:
        a - the semantic object
        Returns:
        a set of semantic groups the object belongs to

      • semTypesInCommon

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> semTypesInCommon​(SemanticItem a,
                                                                         SemanticItem b)
        Finds all semantic types common to two semantic objects.
        Parameters:
        a - the first semantic object
        b - the second semantic object
        Returns:
        a set of semantic types common to both semantic objects

      • semTypeInList

        public static boolean semTypeInList​(SemanticItem a,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> semtypes,
                                    boolean updateType)
        Finds whether a semantic object has a semantic type that is in the semantic type list provided. It takes the first semantic type in iteration, if multiple semantic types are in common. It may update their active semantic type, if specified.
        Parameters:
        a - the semantic object
        semtypes - the list of semantic types
        updateType - whether to update the active semantic types to the common semantic type
        Returns:
        true if the semantic object has a semantic type in the list

      • removeSubsumedTerms

        public static void removeSubsumedTerms​(Document doc)
        Removes atomic semantic objects (Term instances) that are completely subsumed by others in a document.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document with the semantic objects
